devdoc.author: Jack Xu @ EthSign
devdoc.details: An ERC20 token that represents the number of currently claimable unlocked tokens. This token can be added into the investor's wallet, making it easy for them to check on this information without having to go through TokenTable's website.

allowance(address,address).details: This operation is not allowed/implemented on purpose.

approve(address,uint256).details: This operation is not allowed/implemented on purpose.

balanceOf(address).details: Number of currently claimable tokens of the given address.

decimals().details: Returns the decimals places of the token.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply().details: Total number of tokens deposited into the unlocker awaiting claim.

transfer(address,uint256).details: This operation is not allowed/implemented on purpose.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: This operation is not allowed/implemented on purpose.

devdoc.title: TTTrackerTokenV2
